overview: Kiara Cole: My dad is always traveling, so I want to surprise him in his hotel room. But when I get there, he tells me that my mom is cheating on him. They might even get divorced! I am so sad, but I want to help him get over it.  Kyler Quinn: I like camming because it gives me a little extra cash on the side. But of all the cam girls and cam sites in the world, my dad found me! That is such an unlucky break. Especially since he makes me tell him I am a dirty whore.  Zoe Clark: My daddy can be such a jerk! He knows I don't have a car so when I need to borrow his, he knows he's got all the leverage. I will do anything to get the keys and he knows it, telling me to get on my knees and suck him off in the garage.  Emily Willis: Dear daddy, To let you know how much I appreciate all that you do for me I wrote you a little poem that I hope you enjoy. Roses are red, Daisies are white, I'm going to straddle you and fuck you all night!
title: My Daddy's Point of View 8
